definition: ascariasis/infectation by parasitic roundworm Ascaris lumbricoides
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: This disease was often agnostic and misdiagnosed biliary ascariasis in the past.
sentences.chinese: 過去對本病缺乏認識，常誤診爲膽道蛔蟲病。

sentences.english: Objectives To investigate the effect of the treatment of biliary ascarid with duodenoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討十二指腸鏡治療膽道蛔蟲病的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of endoscopy in the diagnosis of biliary tract roundworm disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討採用內鏡診斷膽道蛔蟲病的價值。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the clinical value of endoscopic treatment of biliary ascariasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內鏡治療膽道蛔蟲病的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: The problem of control of the ascariasis was briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 根據實驗結果，對豬蛔蟲病的防治問題進行了討論。
